meanings.definition: Make someone aware of or familiar with something.
meanings.sent1: I am acquainting my friend with the new video game.
meanings.sent2: She is acquainting herself with the rules of the game.
meanings.sent3: Acquainting my cat with a vacuum cleaner was quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The book did a great job of acquainting me with the history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to acquaint the students with new vocabulary words.

meanings.definition: Become familiar with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: After a few days, I am acquainting myself with the new neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The puppy is slowly acquainting itself with the house.
meanings.sent3: I am acquainting myself with the taste of spicy food.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was acquainting herself with a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: The explorer spent months acquainting himself with the local customs before starting his journey.
